targets.expr:
sum by(instance, type) (process_runtime_jvm_memory_usage_bytes{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", type="heap"})
/
sum by(type, instance) (process_runtime_jvm_memory_limit_bytes{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", type="heap"})

1 - sum by(job, instance) (kafka_stream_buffer_allocated_memory_size_bytes{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id"}) / sum by(job, instance) (kafka_stream_buffer_used_memory_size_bytes{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id"})

sum by(job, instance, operation_name, operation_type) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"$s3stream_request", operation_type="S3Stream"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(operation_name, instance) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_type="S3Request", status="failed"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(job, instance, operation_name) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"$s3request", operation_type="S3Request"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg by(instance, operation_name) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_mean_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"$s3request", operation_type="S3Request"})
avg by(instance, operation_name) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_99p_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"$s3request", operation_type="S3Request"})

sum by(instance, operation_name) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"append_wal|append_wal_full", operation_type="S3Storage", stage="complete"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg by(instance, operation_name, stage) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_mean_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"append_wal", operation_type="S3Storage"})
avg by(instance, operation_name, stage) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_99p_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"append_wal", operation_type="S3Storage"})

sum by(job, instance, operation_name, status) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_type="S3Storage", operation_name="read_log_cache"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg by(instance, operation_name) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_mean_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"append_log_cache", operation_type="S3Storage"})
avg by(instance, operation_name, status) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_mean_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name="read_log_cache", operation_type="S3Storage"})
avg by(instance, operation_name) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_99p_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"append_log_cache", operation_type="S3Storage"})
avg by(instance, operation_name, status) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_99p_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name="read_log_cache", operation_type="S3Storage"})

avg by(instance, operation_name, stage) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_mean_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"upload_wal|force_upload_wal", operation_type="S3Storage"})

avg by(instance, operation_name, stage) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_99p_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"upload_wal|force_upload_wal", operation_type="S3Storage"})

sum by(job, instance, operation_name, status) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name=~"read_block_cache", operation_type="S3Storage"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg by(instance, operation_name, status) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_mean_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name="read_block_cache", operation_type="S3Storage"})
avg by(instance, operation_name, status) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_99p_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name="read_block_cache", operation_type="S3Storage"})

sum by(job, instance, operation_name, status) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name="read_ahead", operation_type="S3Storage"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg by(instance, operation_name, status) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_mean_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name="read_ahead", operation_type="S3Storage"})
avg by(instance, operation_name, status) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_99p_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_name="read_ahead", operation_type="S3Storage"})
sum by(instance, job, direction) (rate(kafka_network_io_bytes_total{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", direction="in"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(instance, job, direction) (rate(kafka_network_io_bytes_total{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", direction="out"}[$__rate_interval])) * -1
sum by(size, instance) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{operation_type="S3Request", operation_name="get_object", job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id"}[$__rate_interval]))
avg by(instance, operation_name, size) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_mean_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_type="S3Request", operation_name="get_object"})
avg by(instance, operation_name, size) (kafka_stream_operation_latency_99p_nanoseconds{job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id", operation_type="S3Request", operation_name="get_object"})
sum by(size, instance) (rate(kafka_stream_operation_latency_count{operation_type="S3Request", operation_name=~"put_object|upload_part", job="$cluster_id", instance=~"$node_id"}[$__rate_interval]))
